member.name: M:Infra.Mapper.MappingExtensions.CreateValidatedReverseMap``2(AutoMapper.IMappingExpression{``0,``1})
member.summary: Creates mapping from to , enabling validation so that correctly identifies any missed reverse mappings. This is the expected behavior, as described by the developer (https://github.com/AutoMapper/AutoMapper/issues/2327#issuecomment-332209154)
